1.title: My Life in Your Hands
1.plot: These episodes are based on a story about different things happening in each person's life. Charlie's life isn't going good because his fiancé' Kesha is cheating on him with his best friend Daz which he knows him by D and finds out later on that he's Daz...the number in Kesha's phone. Debra is so caught up in her celebrity career that she can't focus on her kids. Her babysitter/housekeeper (Zetta) threatens to get custody of her kids. Rachel suspects her husband is cheating on her with someone and finds out it's her best friend Francis. Daz borrows money from Freddie ...

2.title: Suspicion of Remorse
2.plot: Marsha owes Freddie money but a stranger comes to pick up the money instead of Ice...Black is out watching, spying on Daz and Kesha...Mark is being blackmailed by Rachel's best friend...Charlie and still trying to discover what Kesha is doing while Daz and Kesha is plotting with Freddie's money.

3.title: No Exceptions No Changes
3.plot: Freddie seeks out to find out who stole his money...Kat invades in on Debra's photo session with a fight...Mark still cheats on Rachel while he's being blackmailed by her best friend and Nicole hires Freddie to hurt Debra. And where do Daz and Charlie finds Kesha.

4.title: The Breaking Point
4.plot: The breaking point when things start to get frantic. Freddie finds out Nicole gave him the wrong name. Mark finally gets caught in his act and causes chaos. Freddie tells Kat to stand down from Debra but she doesn't listen. Black beats up on Daz.

imdb.plot outline: These episodes are based on a story about different things happening in each person's life. Charlie's life isn't going good because his fiancé' Kesha is cheating on him with his best friend Daz which he knows him by D and finds out later on that he's Daz...the number in Kesha's phone! Debra is so caught up in her celebrity career that she can't focus on her kids. Her babysitter/housekeeper (Zetta) threatens to get custody of her kids. Rachel suspects her husband is cheating on her with someone and finds out it's her best friend Francis! Daz borrows money from Freddie the neighborhood OG and later on he has trouble paying him back!
imdb.title: Bound to the Body
plot: These episodes are based on a story about different things happening in each person's life. Charlie's life isn't going good because his fiancé' Kesha is cheating on him with his best friend Daz which he knows him by D and finds out later on that he's Daz...the number in Kesha's phone! Debra is so caught up in her celebrity career that she can't focus on her kids. Her babysitter/housekeeper (Zetta) threatens to get custody of her kids. Rachel suspects her husband is cheating on her with someone and finds out it's her best friend Francis! Daz borrows money from Freddie the neighborhood OG and later on he has trouble paying him back!::Robert L. Parker III
